briefTitle: Apixaban Versus Warfarin in Patients With Left Ventricular Thrombus
officialTitle: Apixaban Versus Warfarin in Patients With Left Ventricular Thrombus: A Prospective Randomized Outcome Blinded Study on the Size Reduction or Resolution of Left Ventricular Thrombus
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the novel oral anticoagulant apixaban with the standard therapy of warfarin on the size reduction or resolution of left ventricular thrombus over 3 months.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change in Left Ventricular Thrombus (LVT) Size
